extendedInfo.description: Make taking notes during a sermon a little easier.A notepad for taking notes during a sermon, keeping verses, other notes and todo or check lists.**NOTE**: Backup before upgrading. Internet is needed to get verses for NIV and NKJV BiblesIf you find this app useful, do consider getting the Donate version to support further development. Note that the Donate version has the same functionalities as the free version.There is a similar version but without the Bible. Please find 'Note Stacks' in the Android MarketHow to use:- Click 'New Note' or 'Add Seg' to add a new note or new segment- Click on 'VERSE' to add verses from the Bible (KJV, NIV, NKJV)- Long press to organise note: insert, cut/copy and paste segments- Keep each segment short to avoid scrolling while editing- Update note label and note type in view text modeFeatures:- quick insert of verse into note- read KJV - export note to a simple text file (.txt) or with markup (.m.txt)- import note from a simple text file (.txt) or with markup (.m.txt)- markup text file keeps the structure of the original note- share the note- full screen when viewing note- labels in the sidebar for easy access- rearrange order of labelsHow is this note app different:- a note consists of segments- reorganise segments by insert, cut/copy and paste- each segment has a title and note areaPlease email suggestions and bugs to gwofoundry@gmail.comTags: KJV, NIV, NKJV  bible, notepad, notes, taking, todo, list, notebook, sermons, speeches, outline, note book

reviews.title: The complete note taking solution
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic note taking app for every situation. On the rare occasion I hear someone else preach I prefer to use a pen and paper but the categorisation of your notes works so well i have stopped using all other note apps except for when I want to keep and annotate something from another application like a photo or Web page. The sermon note section is great for my own Sermon planning and thoughts. 1 star lost is due to sometimes randomly loosing notes - sort this for 5 stars!
reviews.author: Edward Cordle

reviews.comment: Awsome helps you keep up. Every scripture,  note you name it. Great app
